@MarcGra95162166 @HSSHire @MGF_ltd @unitedutilities @ScottishPower @TempWorksForum @RSPBScotland @wearespeedy @EnvAgency @ScottishEPA @NetworkRailSCOT @BBCHighlands @scotgov @cairngormsnews @CairngormMtn Hello Marc. We love a what-if...
The handrails are already used structurally. Rigid links join the deck to handrails so deck deformation is resisted by underslung tensioning ASWELL AS virendeel bending in the handrail ladders (on-side). This is how we derive capacities ~1 Tonneüëç https://t.co/iGbsSlSNMh
